name: Move the Window
description:
2D Platform game that requires unusual solving techniques


Use the different mechanics of each stage to collect all the coins!
Can you solve it without any hints?

Features

  • There are three levels.
  • Different ways to solve each stage.
  • Hint function available.
  • RTA mode. (Please enter --rta in the startup options)

Note: Depending on your Windows version and security software, you may not be able to play the game properly. (System requirements: Microsoft Windows 10, Microsoft Defender)
